Room.Name: Islandia Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Islandia Drive, north of the Evenborough Park.
Room.LongDescription: The lush green Evenborough Park is the home to many of birds and other small animals of the forest. The path into the Park is directly to the south. On the north side of the road is the Darmanian Memorial, a preservation for ancient artifacts of old civilizations.
